column1: Imagine not knowing what adjucated means
Not guilty. Still your next President KAREN.  Cope.
Imagine being proud of this tweet. He demeans women on a daily basis and wants to strip you of your rights. 24 sexual harassment allegations. Paid 5 million for being “not guilty”. Stay proud
Poor Karen seems to be having a difficult time accepting the fact that Trump is not guilty and is STILL GOING TO BE YOUR NEXT PRESIDENT.
